featureType.name: flood_warning_alert
featureType.title: flood_warning_alert
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: flood_warning_alert
virtualTable.sql: SELECT ta_code as id, ta_code as taCode, ta_code, ta_name, severity_value, severity, CASE WHEN severity_value = 1 THEN 'severe' WHEN severity_value = 2 THEN 'warning' WHEN severity_value = 3 THEN 'alert' ELSE 'removed' END AS state, geom FROM u_flood.fwa_mview ORDER BY severity_value desc
